ai-tha-ap229:0.3_0: he gave the Elder’s golden plates
ai-tha-ap229:1.2_0: I saw the benefit of the world,
ai-tha-ap229:2.2_0: I shook the back of an elephant,
ai-tha-ap229:2.3_0: I rejoice in the Buddha’s instruction.
ai-tha-ap229:3.2_0: it was all over the flower.
ai-tha-ap229:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap229:3.4_0: this carpet is full of fruit.
ai-tha-ap229:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Soṇa.
ai-tha-ap229:7.1_0: made of gold coins and bullion for the seventh months.
